item.title: The unflinching inner life of a girl growing up
item.author: Anisha Kadri,
item.description: The audience sits calmly, unaware of the storm that is poised to strike. A single figure stands on stage in pyjamas. There are no other voices in this narrative, no props or distractions. The only ornament of this stage is just a girl, half-formed. She is a stranger just yet. By the end, we know her â€¦
